column1: Little Goat Diner////The diner was packed
column3: so we didn't end up waiting long. This place had a pretty diverse menu and unique daily specials. The food overall was really satisfying. We had a larger group
column4: but the service was definitely lacking; hence the lower rating. I really wanted to love this place
column6: the service should have been way better. It took forever to do anything with our waiter. We were in the diner for over 2.5 hours simply because it took so long to order
column7: eat and pay for our food.
